set(LEVELDB_COMMON_CMAKE_ARGS "-DCMAKE_SYSTEM_PREFIX_PATH=${EXTERNAL_BINARY_INSTALL_DIR} -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE} -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=${EXTERNAL_BINARY_INSTALL_DIR}")

if(ANDROID)
  set(LEVELDB_ANDROID_CMAKE_ARGS "${LEVELDB_COMMON_CMAKE_ARGS} -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE} -DANDROID_PLATFORM=${ANDROID_PLATFORM} -DANDROID_STL=${ANDROID_STL} -DANDROID_ABI=${ANDROID_ABI}")
  set(SNAPPY_CMAKE_ARGS "${LEVELDB_ANDROID_CMAKE_ARGS} -DSNAPPY_BUILD_TESTS=OFF")
  set(LEVELDB_CMAKE_ARGS "${LEVELDB_ANDROID_CMAKE_ARGS} -DHAVE_CRC32C=OFF -DHAVE_TCMALLOC=OFF")
elseif(IOS)
  set(LEVELDB_IOS_CMAKE_ARGS "${LEVELDB_COMMON_CMAKE_ARGS} -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE} -DPLATFORM=${PLATFORM} -DSIMULATOR=${SIMULATOR}")
  set(SNAPPY_CMAKE_ARGS "${LEVELDB_IOS_CMAKE_ARGS} -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE} -DPLATFORM=${PLATFORM} -DSIMULATOR=${SIMULATOR} -DSNAPPY_BUILD_TESTS=OFF")
  set(LEVELDB_CMAKE_ARGS "${LEVELDB_IOS_CMAKE_ARGS} -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE} -DPLATFORM=${PLATFORM} -DSIMULATOR=${SIMULATOR} -DHAVE_CRC32C=OFF -DHAVE_TCMALLOC=OFF")
elseif(WIN32)
  set(LEVELDB_WIN32_CMAKE_ARGS "${LEVELDB_COMMON_CMAKE_ARGS} -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE}")
  set(SNAPPY_CMAKE_ARGS "${LEVELDB_WIN32_CMAKE_ARGS} -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE} -DSNAPPY_BUILD_TESTS=OFF")
  set(LEVELDB_CMAKE_ARGS "${LEVELDB_WIN32_CMAKE_ARGS} -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE} -DHAVE_CRC32C=OFF -DHAVE_TCMALLOC=OFF")
else()
  set(LEVELDB_CMAKE_ARGS "${LEVELDB_COMMON_CMAKE_ARGS}")
  set(SNAPPY_CMAKE_ARGS "${LEVELDB_CMAKE_ARGS} -DSNAPPY_BUILD_TESTS=OFF")
  set(LEVELDB_CMAKE_ARGS "${LEVELDB_CMAKE_ARGS} -DHAVE_CRC32C=OFF -DHAVE_TCMALLOC=OFF")
endif()

set(LEVELDB_CMAKE_ARGS "${LEVELDB_CMAKE_ARGS} -DCMAKE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE=ON")

# Download and unpack leveldb at configure time
configure_file(CMakeLists.txt.leveldb.in download/CMakeLists.txt)

execute_process(COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "${CMAKE_GENERATOR}" .
  RESULT_VARIABLE result
  WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/download)
if(result)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "CMake step for leveldb failed: ${result}")
endif()

file(COPY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/CMakeLists-leveldb.txt
     DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/config/leveldb)
file(RENAME ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/config/leveldb/CMakeLists-leveldb.txt
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/config/leveldb/CMakeLists.txt)

execute_process(COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} --build . --config ${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE}
  RESULT_VARIABLE result
  WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/download)
if(result)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "Build step for leveldb failed: ${result}")
endif()

# Provide the dir to the leveldb cmake configuration files
set(EXTERNAL_leveldb_DIR ${EXTERNAL_BINARY_INSTALL_DIR}/lib/cmake/leveldb PARENT_SCOPE)
set(EXTERNAL_Snappy_DIR ${EXTERNAL_BINARY_INSTALL_DIR}/lib/cmake/Snappy PARENT_SCOPE)
set(EXTERNAL_leveldb_INCLUDE_DIR ${EXTERNAL_BINARY_INSTALL_DIR}/include PARENT_SCOPE)
